          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of a poly(vinyl chloride) molecule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung eines poly(vinyl Chlorverbindung) 
Moleküls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation d'une molécule de chlorure de 
poly(vinyl)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de uma molécula do cloreto do 
poly(vinyl)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di una molecola del cloruro di 
poly(vinyl)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός ενός μορίου χλωριδίου poly(vinyl)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de una molécula del cloruro del 
poly(vinyl)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates many vinyl chloride molecules joining together to form a poly(vinyl chloride) molecule.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poly(vinyl chloride)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vinyl chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht viele 
Vinylchlorverbindung Moleküle, die zusammen verbinden, um ein 
poly(vinyl Chlorverbindung) Molekül zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre beaucoup de molécules de 
chlorure de vinyle se joignant ensemble pour former une molécule de 
chlorure de poly(vinyl).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra muitas moléculas do 
cloreto de vinil que juntam junto para dar forma a uma molécula do 
cloreto do poly(vinyl).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra molte molecole del cloruro
di etile che si uniscono insieme per formare una molecola del cloruro 
di poly(vinyl).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πολλά μόρια βινυλίου 
χλωριδίου που ενώνουν μαζί για να διαμορφώσει ένα μόριο 
χλωριδίου poly(vinyl).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra muchas moléculas del 
cloruro de vinilo que ensamblan junto para formar una molécula del 
cloruro del poly(vinyl).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Öl</string>
